name: Squidder
description:
Squidder is a 2D level based game consisting of 5 sort levels. The goal is to get to the top of the level. Watch out! Piranhas are out to get poor Squidder! The game is based in the bottom of the ocean.

Left and right mouse to move!

This is my first published game. I am new to game development and would love to see if anyone can give me a few tips :) feedback is always welcome.
